Class ResourceUtils

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.plexus.archiver.util.ResourceUtils
public class ResourceUtils extends Object
Utility class for work with PlexusIoResource instances.

    • isCanonicalizedSame

      public static boolean isCanonicalizedSame(org.codehaus.plexus.components.io.resources.PlexusIoResource resource, File file) throws IOException
      Checks, whether the resource and the file are identical. Uses File.getCanonicalFile() for comparison, which is much slower than comparing the files.
      Throws:
      IOException
